Articles.Content: hey guys is there a way to find out what mod can cause memory leak?i got 1.7 game data and ksp crashes after 1 hour of play

I don't think you can see what mods are specifically causing leaks without manually testing each one. In any case the base game has memory leaks (such as each scene change).

Best suggestion I have is to use [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118928-1-0-2-Sentinel-Memory-Monitoring-Utility-%28v0-3-Beta%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/118928-1-0-2-Sentinel-Memory-Monitoring-Utility-%28v0-3-Beta%29)

This will give you a warning when you are about to hit the limit, that way you can save and restart the game.
Make sure you have PPFX disabled in the graphics settings, Huge leak there
